name: Living Colossus
description: The Living Colossus is a gargantuan construct that resembles a mighty statue, radiating strength and endurance on the battlefield.
memorable: Its ability to deal double damage to structures and its unique thunderous clap attack make it a formidable presence.
goals: To protect its allies while dominating the battlefield through sheer power and ability.
relations: May serve a powerful wizard or be constructed from the essence of a past champion.
environment: Often found in ancient ruins or battlefields as a guardian or sentinel.
strengths: High hit points, formidable strength, and multiple devastating attacks.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity, making it poor at stealth and agile maneuvers.
attacks: Three Slam attacks that deal significant bludgeoning damage or four Spirit Blast attacks delivering psychic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Thunderous Clap creates devastating thunder damage in a wide area, disrupting foes.
senses: Has heightened perception with a passive score of 17.
skills: Immunity to poison and psychic damage enhances its combat resilience.
additional_information: Construct Nature allows it to function without air, food, drink, or sleep.
False Appearance lets it disguise itself as a statue when motionless.
Immutable Form ensures it cannot be transformed or altered.
Bolstering Spirit can heal allies when they are damaged.
Quake ability can knock opponents prone and stun them.

guardian of ruins that deals double damage
